name: HTML
description: HTML is the standard markup language for Web pages.With HTML you can create your own Website.
shortDescription: The language for building web pages

name: CSS
description: CSS is the language we use to style an HTML document.CSS describes how HTML elements should be displayed.This tutorial will teach you CSS from basic to advanced
shortDescription: The language for styling web pages

name: JavaScript
description: JavaScript is the worlds most popular programming language.JavaScript is the programming language of the Web.JavaScript is easy to learn
shortDescription: The language for programming web pages

name: PYTHON
description: Python is a popular programming language.Python can be used on a server to create web applications.

name: SQL
description: Our SQL tutorial will teach you how to use SQL in: MySQL, SQL Server, MS Access, Oracle, Sybase, Informix, Postgres, and other database systems

name: Bootstrap
description: Bootstrap is the most popular HTML, CSS, and JavaScript framework for developing responsive, mobile-first websites.
shortDescription: A CSS framework for designing better web pages

name: React
description: React is used to build single-page applications.React allows us to create reusable UI components.
shortDescription: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

name: jQuery
description: jQuery is a JavaScript Library.jQuery greatly simplifies JavaScript programming.jQuery is easy to learn..
shortDescription: A JS library for developing web pages.

name: C++
description: C++ is an object-oriented programming language which gives a clear structure to programs and allows code to be reused, lowering development costs
shortDescription: C++ is a popular programming language

name: Node.js
description: Node.js runs single-threaded, non-blocking, asynchronously programming, which is very memory efficient
shortDescription: Node.js allows you to run JavaScript on the server

name: NumPy
description: NumPy is a Python library used for working with arrays.It also has functions for working in domain of linear algebra, fourier transform, and matrices
